column4: Does anybody know why Firefox @ Ubuntu comsumes so much CPU while rendering some web-pages? A single site with ~30 medium-size images loads CPU (3.066GHz) up to 40% for 1s. Same on Windows is rendered with almost zero CPU usage.
u see, q3 runs on ubuntu at 90 fps, while at 50 on Windows. Hence Windows sucks?
it might be related to caching - I cache to ramdisk & don't have issues
